NI Remote I/O EtherCAT Slave

NI Remote I/O EtherCAT Slave is a container for an NI Remote I/O EtherCAT slave connected to an EtherCAT master on your controller.

Slave Position indicates the location of the EtherCAT slave relative to the EtherCAT Master (with position 0 being the closest). For example, if you have three EtherCAT slaves all daisy-chained together off of the same EtherCAT master, the slave closest to the master will be position 0, then next slave will be position 1, and the last slave will be position 2.

What do you want to do?

View or change module settings

To view settings for a module, select the appropriate module in the configuration tree.
